statements: SELECT * FROM monitoring_systems WHERE system_id = 1
SELECT system_name, cpu_utilization FROM monitoring_systems WHERE memory_utilization > 80.00
SELECT system_id, system_name, disk_utilization FROM monitoring_systems WHERE cpu_utilization < 50.00 AND alert_threshold > 90.00
SELECT system_name, memory_utilization FROM monitoring_systems WHERE disk_utilization BETWEEN 20.00 AND 40.00
SELECT system_id, cpu_utilization, disk_utilization, alert_threshold FROM monitoring_systems WHERE memory_utilization < 40.00
SELECT system_id, system_name, cpu_utilization, memory_utilization FROM monitoring_systems WHERE cpu_utilization > 80 ORDER BY memory_utilization DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT system_id, system_name, cpu_utilization, memory_utilization, disk_utilization FROM monitoring_systems WHERE memory_utilization < 50 AND disk_utilization < 60 ORDER BY system_name;
SELECT system_id, system_name, alert_threshold FROM monitoring_systems WHERE alert_threshold BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY system_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_systems WHERE cpu_utilization >= 30 AND memory_utilization <= 70 ORDER BY disk_utilization ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT system_name, cpu_utilization, memory_utilization, disk_utilization FROM monitoring_systems WHERE disk_utilization > 50 AND alert_threshold > 80 ORDER BY system_name, cpu_utilization DESC;
SELECT * FROM system_resources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT resource_name, utilization FROM system_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Database';
SELECT * FROM system_resources ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM system_resources WHERE utilization > 0.8;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alerts WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM system_resources WHERE utilization > 0.5 ORDER BY utilization DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, utilization FROM system_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Database' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY triggered_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(utilization) AS average_utilization, resource_type FROM system_resources GROUP BY resource_type;
SELECT * FROM system_resources JOIN alerts ON system_resources.id = alerts.alert_id WHERE resolved = TRUE;
SELECT id, server_name, cpu_utilization, memory_utilization FROM monitoring_system;
SELECT server_name, cpu_utilization FROM monitoring_system ORDER BY cpu_utilization DESC;
SELECT * FROM alert_history WHERE alert_type = 'CPU Overload';
SELECT DISTINCT server_name FROM monitoring_system;
SELECT MAX(resource_value) AS max_resource_value FROM resource_tracking;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_system;
SELECT server_name, cpu_utilization FROM monitoring_system ORDER BY cpu_utilization DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_system WHERE memory_utilization > 0.5;
SELECT server_name, memory_utilization FROM monitoring_system WHERE cpu_utilization < 0.3;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_value FROM resource_tracking ORDER BY resource_value ASC;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value, timestamp FROM SystemMetrics;
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_level='High';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM Resources ORDER BY resource_capacity DESC;
SELECT service_name, status FROM ServiceStatus WHERE status='Offline';
SELECT id, alert_type, alert_message, timestamp FROM Alerts WHERE alert_level='Critical';
SELECT * FROM SystemMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM SystemMetrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'CPU%' AND metric_value > 80;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_capacity FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'Memory' ORDER BY resource_capacity DESC;
SELECT service_name, status FROM ServiceStatus WHERE status = 'Error' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE alert_level = 'Critical';
SELECT * FROM resource_utilization_monitoring;
SELECT resource_name, usage_percent FROM resource_utilization_monitoring WHERE usage_percent > 80;
SELECT timestamp, message FROM alerts JOIN alerts_history ON alerts.alert_id = alerts_history.alert_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT resource_name, description FROM resources WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT resource_name, usage_percent, timestamp FROM resource_utilization_monitoring ORDER BY usage_percent DESC;

SELECT resources.resource_name, resources.description, alerts.history_id FROM resources INNER JOIN alerts ON resources.resource_id = alerts.resource_id WHERE alerts.severity = 'high' ORDER BY alerts.timestamp DESC;

SELECT users.username, resources.resource_name, alerts.message FROM users INNER JOIN alerts ON users.user_id = alerts.resource_id INNER JOIN resources ON alerts.resource_id = resources.resource_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT DISTINCT resource_name, usage_percent FROM resource_utilization_monitoring WHERE usage_percent > 80 ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
